channel.title: Ti-basic molar mass base
channel.description:
well i got bored so i decided to write a base for finding molar mass for ti-basic. works with ti-83 and ti-84 [code]ClrHome "H.01HE04LI07BE09B.11C.12N.14O.16F.19NE20NA23MG24AL27SI28P.31"→Str1 Input "1stElem=",Str2 Input "amtof1stElem=",A Input "2ndElem=",Str3 If inString(Str3,"0") Goto 1 Input "amtof2ndElem=",B Input "3rdElem=",Str4 If inString(Str4,"0") Goto 2 Input "amto3rdElem=",C Input "4thElem=",Str5 If inString(Str5,"0") Goto 3 Input "amto4thElem=",D Input "5thElem=",Str6 If inString(Str6,"0") Goto 4 Input "amto5thElem=",E Input "6thElem=",Str7 If inString(Str7,"0") Goto 5 Input "amto6thElem=",F Goto 6 Lbl1 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G G*A→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl2 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H (G*A)+(H*B)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl3 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,I+2,2)→I (G*A)+(H*B)+(I*C)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl4 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,I+2,2)→I inString(Str1,Str5)→J expr(sub(Str1,J+2,2)→J (F*A)+(G*B)+(H*C)+(I*D)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl5 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→I inString(Str1,Str5)→J expr(sub(Str1,J+2,2)→J inString(Str1,Str6)→K expr(sub(Str1,K+2,2)→K (G*A)+(H*B)+(I*C)+(J*D)+(K*E)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl6 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→I inString(Str1,Str5)→J expr(sub(Str1,J+2,2)→J inString(Str1,Str6)→K expr(sub(Str1,K+2,2)→K inString(Str1,Str7)→L expr(sub(Str1,L+2,2)→L (G*A)+(H*B)+(I*C)+(J*D)+(K*E)+(L*F)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl 10 ClrHome Disp "by 0bbyme" Pause Stop [/code] i only coded it to phosphorus right now ill add the rest tomorrow. and ill add converting to mols. How to use. it will ask for the element, put the elements symbol next to it. if the symbol only has one letter such as O for oxygen do O. if the element's symbol has 2 letters make sure both of them are capitol letters. if you only have 2 elements when it asks for a 3rd say 0 ,the number i will add more to it tomorrow im a bit sleepy =P Tell me what you guys think or should add to it.
o yea also dont be stupid and type all this into your calculator, download the ti connect x from texas instrument website. and use a mini usb plug =P

item.title: Ti-basic molar mass base
item.dc:creator: @0bbyme 0bbyme
item.description:
@0bbyme wrote:

well i got bored so i decided to write a base for finding molar mass for ti-basic. works with ti-83 and ti-84

ClrHome "H.01HE04LI07BE09B.11C.12N.14O.16F.19NE20NA23MG24AL27SI28P.31"→Str1 Input "1stElem=",Str2 Input "amtof1stElem=",A Input "2ndElem=",Str3 If inString(Str3,"0") Goto 1 Input "amtof2ndElem=",B Input "3rdElem=",Str4 If inString(Str4,"0") Goto 2 Input "amto3rdElem=",C Input "4thElem=",Str5 If inString(Str5,"0") Goto 3 Input "amto4thElem=",D Input "5thElem=",Str6 If inString(Str6,"0") Goto 4 Input "amto5thElem=",E Input "6thElem=",Str7 If inString(Str7,"0") Goto 5 Input "amto6thElem=",F Goto 6 Lbl1 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G G*A→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl2 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H (G*A)+(H*B)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl3 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,I+2,2)→I (G*A)+(H*B)+(I*C)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl4 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,I+2,2)→I inString(Str1,Str5)→J expr(sub(Str1,J+2,2)→J (F*A)+(G*B)+(H*C)+(I*D)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl5 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→I inString(Str1,Str5)→J expr(sub(Str1,J+2,2)→J inString(Str1,Str6)→K expr(sub(Str1,K+2,2)→K (G*A)+(H*B)+(I*C)+(J*D)+(K*E)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl6 inString(Str1,Str2)→G expr(sub(Str1,G+2,2)→G inString(Str1,Str3)→H expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→H inString(Str1,Str4)→I expr(sub(Str1,H+2,2)→I inString(Str1,Str5)→J expr(sub(Str1,J+2,2)→J inString(Str1,Str6)→K expr(sub(Str1,K+2,2)→K inString(Str1,Str7)→L expr(sub(Str1,L+2,2)→L (G*A)+(H*B)+(I*C)+(J*D)+(K*E)+(L*F)→F Disp F Pause Goto 10 Lbl 10 ClrHome Disp "by 0bbyme" Pause Stop
i only coded it to phosphorus right now ill add the rest tomorrow. and ill add converting to mols.
How to use.
it will ask for the element, put the elements symbol next to it.
if the symbol only has one letter such as O for oxygen do O.
if the element’s symbol has 2 letters make sure both of them are capitol letters.
if you only have 2 elements when it asks for a 3rd say 0 ,the number
i will add more to it tomorrow im a bit sleepy =P
Tell me what you guys think or should add to it.

o yea also dont be stupid and type all this into your calculator, download the ti connect x from texas instrument website. and use a mini usb plug =P
